title: Mobile App-Based Training Course to Improve Medication Calculation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Arithmetic Operations (Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division) and Simple Calculation Experience in Daily Life
context.additional_context: Public health competency enhancement program for general citizens. Applying blended learning combining mobile apps and offline activities in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can solve medication dosage calculation problems related to daily health management with 80% accuracy.
Learners improve their self-efficacy by over 30% when performing medication calculations.
Learners can apply appropriate calculation procedures according to various medication administration scenarios (liquids, tablets, injections, etc.).

resources: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Mobile Learning Application
Offline workbook and practice problem sets

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
